message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. This is a fair price that still allows you to benefit from the product while also reflecting its true value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe it's a fair price that still reflects the product's value to me, while also being a good deal for you.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1020000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. This price reflects the product's value to you and still allows you to benefit from it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $990000. I believe it's a fair price that still reflects the product's value to me, while also being a good deal for you.
